gobblin.compaction.mapreduce.avro

Class AvroCombineFileSplit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputSplit
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.CombineFileSplit
        • gobblin.compaction.mapreduce.avro.AvroCombineFileSplit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class AvroCombineFileSplit
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.CombineFileSplit
    A subclass of CombineFileSplit. The purpose is to add the input file's avro schema to a split.
